snippet.title: Gennady - 2nd Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/4gMtVan

Gennady is a bloody mix of platformer and roguelike, in which an ordinary working man has to wade through a green slurry and crowds of alien creatures.

Rise from the green slurry, and direct your rage at the diverse monsters of the alien world, with complete disregard for workplace safety.

Everywhere you look there's blood, noir and disregard for safety. You hesitate, you get crushed by the press. Stand in the wrong place, you get punctured by spikes. And the locals are hungry for a piece of that steak in their underpants. But there's no time to wonder, you've got to take matters into your own hands.

#games #roguelike #indiegame
